[Skill Training (Kingdom)](/Feats.aspx?ID=3924) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Kingdom" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=438" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 532</row>

---

Your kingdom receives the trained proficiency rank in a Kingdom skill of your choice. You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a new skill each time
name: Skill Training (Kingdom)
